body:
Aren't staff applications meant to be open ?

Thanks
body_tagged:

title: Question

replies.body: I was wondering the same thing!
replies.body_tagged: I was wondering the same thing!

replies.body:
"Also, a quick note. Staff applications will be delayed a day or so. Until I can get the subform up and running. Again, sorry for any inconvenience. We'll have them open longer to accommodate for this delay." - Posighdun.

Apologies for the delay.
